thought: The first step in crafting a beehive is to craft acacia planks and jungle planks. Since there is no acacia log, I will use the stripped acacia log at slot 39 instead. The recipe requires placing the acacia log in the center of the crafting table, so I will move it to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: beehive
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "beetroot_seeds", "quantity": 47, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 30, "index": 14}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 3, "index": 17}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 15, "index": 27}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 40, "index": 29}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 36, "index": 40}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the acacia planks, I can move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) to make space for the next recipe.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a beehive, I need to place honeycomb in the center of the crafting grid, and then surround it with planks. Since I already have honeycomb in my inventory, I will first move the honeycomb to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
